parsed.plot: DEV: Senta extracted Rance's commitment to contingency (knock him out if he loses control). Rance collapsed into Gift-shock sleep for days. Senta made relentless three-day journey to Haven, stopping only when necessary. Arrived Haven morning of fourth day; guards alerted Collegium. Healers transferred unconscious Rance to stretcher. Rolan (Queen's Own Companion) greeted Senta, offered support. PEND: Rance still unconscious, needs Healing and training; Karsite blood magic threat unresolved; memories of attack remain blocked; nature of his Gift (possibly unprecedented in 500 years) unknown to leadership.

entities.c: Suspects Rance's Gift unprecedented in ~500 years—rarer/more dangerous than Firestarting, no one capable of training him. Confirmed Karsite blood magic historically real, officially banned for decades. Maintained tireless pace three days straight to Haven (record time); exhausted but refused to leave Rance's side upon arrival. STANCE-Rance: protective; will protect him even from himself; refused separation even in exhaustion.

Gift-shock collapsed him into unconscious sleep for three days straight. Committed to contingency: ordered Senta to knock him out if he loses control; fears accidentally killing Queen/Circle. Identified attackers as Karsite despite disguise; theorizes blood magic/ritual sacrifice.
Queen's Own Companion. Greeted Senta upon arrival at Haven Collegium; offered support, told her she'd done well and should rest.

Capital city; white stone walls; Palace complex at heart contains Collegium (Herald training). Healers' Collegium within Palace grounds responded to Senta's arrival. Rance delivered here unconscious after three-day journey.
